title: Hills View
description: Modern-day Cinderella stories come with many twists these days. My story is no different-Twist number one: After my parent's death, I found a family that loved me like their own.Twist number two: When I met my Prince Charming for the first time, I was the one who took him to the hospital.Twist number three: After our happily ever after, he was the one who ran away, leaving behind a simple note.Now, he is back in my life. His presence has turned my world upside down yet again. He is just looking for a fling with an old flame, whereas I am still madly in love with him. How am I going to avoid getting hurt this time?
author: Meenu Pillai
